text:
Café "Le Moment" stands in a corner of the town.
The manager and the crew are working hard today as well.

However...
There aren't many people coming in...

It's slow today, ain't it? Even after we got us a new
seasonal menu and everything, no one's givin' a hoot...

Not even with...
your delicious fruit tart...

Ah know, right~?
It's one of our best dishes too...

────...
If only people could tell... that it's delicious...

Is there anything...
we can do...?

Hmm... I think there is...
Someone suggested we try social media...
But I ain't know nothin' about it, though~

Yeah... but...
Maybe we should give it a try...

...Guess yer right. Everyone starts as a beginner!
Let's give it a go!

"Try our new menu item! Our tart made with lots of
seasonal fruit! We got drip coffee waiting for you too!"

There! I uploaded the photos properly!
Now customers are sure to come on in~!

"Looks delicious, but where is the café located?
I'd like to know the exact location and the price of the tart."

Fueh?! Oh gosh, that's true...! Them customers won't
be comin' in if we don't write exactly where we are, yeah~?

Yes...
Let's do it properly once more...

It may be hard, but goin' through this learnin' process
kinda warms the heart, don'tcha think?
